expo.name: XS Card
expo.description: XS Card - Your digital business card solution. Create, share, and manage professional digital business cards with premium features. Terms of Use: https://xscard.co.za/terms

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: XSCard uses the camera to let you take profile pictures and company logos during account setup and card creation. This helps create professional digital business cards.

plugins.photosPermission: XSCard accesses your photos to let you select profile pictures and company logos from your gallery during account setup and card creation.
plugins.cameraPermission: XSCard uses your camera to let you take profile pictures and company logos during account setup and card creation for your digital business card.
